auto}.dropdown-filter,.dropdown-sort{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.admin{background-image:none}.overskrift{display:grid;width:100%;grid-template-areas:"a . . b b . c"}.listHeading{text-align:center;margin:20px 0 10px}.overskrift a{grid-area:c;border:2px solid #000;border-radius:4px;margin:auto 6px;cursor:pointer;color:#000;background-color:#cfcfcf;text-decoration:none;font-family:Varela Round,sans-serif;text-align:center;padding:10px}#editForm{border:none;border-radius:0;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:0}#editForm input,#editForm label{font-family:Varela Round,sans-serif;font-size:20px}#editForm input{width:100%;margin-left:5px}#editForm div{display:flex;flex-direction:row;margin-bottom:20px}.gone{display:none}@media only screen and (min-width:700px){#app{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;margin:20px auto;max-width:800px}}@media only screen and (min-width:1100px){#app{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;margin:20px auto;max-width:1200px}}
